2020 September

First Gameplay Footage & Narrative Video

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://angelicthegame.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/arrow-down.png” title_text=”arrow-down” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” module_alignment=”center” max_height=”100px” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_5″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_divider color=”#FFFFFF” divider_style=”dotted” divider_position=”center” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”10%||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_5″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_accordion _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_accordion_item title=”keep empty” open=”on” open_toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” body_text_color=”#FFFFFF” body_line_height=”1.5em” background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” background_enable_color=”on” text_orientation=”center” custom_css_main_element=”display: none !important” border_color_all=”#FFFFFF” border_style_all=”dotted” global_colors_info=”{}” toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” toggle_level=”h3″ toggle_text_align=”right” toggle_font_size=”16px” toggle_line_height=”1.4em”]

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”2020 April Incorporation” open_toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” body_text_color=”#FFFFFF” body_line_height=”1.5em” background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” background_enable_color=”on” text_orientation=”center” border_color_all=”#FFFFFF” border_style_all=”dotted” global_colors_info=”{}” toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” toggle_level=”h3″ toggle_text_align=”left” toggle_font_size=”16px” toggle_line_height=”1.4em” open=”off”]

After the coup, the team had to scatter. Erkan (CEO) dived into cryptocurrencies, learned technical analysis and trading, made some money, and used it to restart the company in 2020. Dozens of talented artists and developers joined him in the creation of Angelic’s first vertical slice. The seed money quickly vanished but 70 people did not stop working. Thanks to their sacrifices and commitment, we finished the vertical slice in approximately 1 year.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][/et_pb_accordion][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_5″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_divider color=”#FFFFFF” divider_style=”dotted” divider_position=”center” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”10%||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_5″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_accordion _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_accordion_item title=”keep empty” open=”on” open_toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” body_text_color=”#FFFFFF” body_line_height=”1.5em” background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” background_enable_color=”on” text_orientation=”center” custom_css_main_element=”display: none !important” border_color_all=”#FFFFFF” border_style_all=”dotted” global_colors_info=”{}” toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” toggle_level=”h3″ toggle_text_align=”right” toggle_font_size=”16px” toggle_line_height=”1.4em”]

keep empty

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”2016 Early Prototypes” open_toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” body_text_color=”#FFFFFF” body_line_height=”1.5em” background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” background_enable_color=”on” text_orientation=”center” border_color_all=”#FFFFFF” border_style_all=”dotted” global_colors_info=”{}” toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” toggle_level=”h3″ toggle_text_align=”left” toggle_font_size=”16px” toggle_line_height=”1.4em” open=”off”]

The team started working on early prototypes and concepts in 2016. We wanted to merge traditional gaming with the blockchain, developed some promising prototypes but had to stop after the military coup in Turkey.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][/et_pb_accordion][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_5,1_5,1_5,1_5,1_5″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” transform_scale_tablet=”” transform_scale_phone=”” transform_scale_last_edited=”on|tablet” transform_translate_tablet=”0px|0px” transform_translate_phone=”0px|0px” transform_translate_last_edited=”on|tablet” transform_translate_linked=”off” transform_translate_linked_tablet=”off” transform_rotate_tablet=”” transform_rotate_phone=”” transform_rotate_last_edited=”on|tablet” transform_skew_tablet=”” transform_skew_phone=”” transform_skew_last_edited=”on|tablet” transform_origin_tablet=”” transform_origin_phone=”” transform_origin_last_edited=”on|tablet” transform_styles_last_edited=”on|tablet” custom_padding=”1px||5px|4px||” transform_styles_tablet=”” transform_styles_phone=”” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_5″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_accordion _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” toggle_text_align=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_accordion_item title=”keep empty” open=”on” open_toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” body_text_color=”#FFFFFF” body_line_height=”1.5em” background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” background_enable_color=”on” text_orientation=”center” custom_css_main_element=”display: none !important” border_color_all=”#FFFFFF” border_style_all=”dotted” global_colors_info=”{}” toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” toggle_level=”h3″ toggle_text_align=”right” toggle_font_size=”16px” toggle_line_height=”1.4em”]

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”2021 March Angelic Early Stage Playable Demo #1″ open_toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” body_text_color=”#FFFFFF” body_line_height=”1.5em” background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” background_enable_color=”on” text_orientation=”center” border_color_all=”#FFFFFF” border_style_all=”dotted” global_colors_info=”{}” toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” toggle_level=”h3″ toggle_text_align=”left” toggle_font_size=”16px” toggle_line_height=”1.4em” open=”off”]

First playable verticle slice was distributed to publishers and partners, for early feedback and suggestions.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][/et_pb_accordion][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_5″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_divider color=”#FFFFFF” divider_style=”dotted” divider_position=”center” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”10%||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_5″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_accordion _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_accordion_item title=”keep empty” open=”on” open_toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” body_text_color=”#FFFFFF” body_line_height=”1.5em” background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” background_enable_color=”on” text_orientation=”center” custom_css_main_element=”display: none !important” border_color_all=”#FFFFFF” border_style_all=”dotted” global_colors_info=”{}” toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” toggle_level=”h3″ toggle_text_align=”right” toggle_font_size=”16px” toggle_line_height=”1.4em”]

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”2021 April Steam Storepage Demo Distribution to Influencers” open_toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” body_text_color=”#FFFFFF” body_line_height=”1.5em” background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” background_enable_color=”on” text_orientation=”center” border_color_all=”#FFFFFF” border_style_all=”dotted” global_colors_info=”{}” toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” toggle_level=”h3″ toggle_text_align=”left” toggle_font_size=”16px” toggle_line_height=”1.4em” open=”off”]

Based on feedback received from publishers, the demo is enhanced and polished further, then distributed to select influencers to get feedback from audience.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][/et_pb_accordion][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_5″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_divider color=”#FFFFFF” divider_style=”dotted” divider_position=”center” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”10%||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_5″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_accordion _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_accordion_item title=”keep empty” open=”on” open_toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” body_text_color=”#FFFFFF” body_line_height=”1.5em” background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” background_enable_color=”on” text_orientation=”center” custom_css_main_element=”display: none !important” border_color_all=”#FFFFFF” border_style_all=”dotted” global_colors_info=”{}” toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” toggle_level=”h3″ toggle_text_align=”right” toggle_font_size=”16px” toggle_line_height=”1.4em”]

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”2021 Q3-Q4 Onboarding Advisors and Seed Investors” open_toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” body_text_color=”#FFFFFF” body_line_height=”1.5em” background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” background_enable_color=”on” text_orientation=”center” border_color_all=”#FFFFFF” border_style_all=”dotted” global_colors_info=”{}” toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” toggle_level=”h3″ toggle_text_align=”left” toggle_font_size=”16px” toggle_line_height=”1.4em” open=”off”]

Blockchain team enhanced with experienced advisors and strategic partners. The process of onboarding seed investors begins.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][/et_pb_accordion][et_pb_image src=”https://angelicthegame.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/arrow-down.png” title_text=”arrow-down” align=”right” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” module_alignment=”center” max_height=”100px” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_5,1_5,1_5,1_5,1_5″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” transform_scale_tablet=”” transform_scale_phone=”” transform_scale_last_edited=”on|tablet” transform_translate_tablet=”0px|0px” transform_translate_phone=”0px|0px” transform_translate_last_edited=”on|tablet” transform_translate_linked=”off” transform_rotate_tablet=”” transform_rotate_phone=”” transform_rotate_last_edited=”on|tablet” transform_skew_tablet=”” transform_skew_phone=”” transform_skew_last_edited=”on|tablet” transform_origin_tablet=”” transform_origin_phone=”” transform_origin_last_edited=”on|tablet” transform_styles_last_edited=”on|tablet” custom_padding=”2px||2px|||” transform_styles_tablet=”” transform_styles_phone=”” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_5″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_accordion _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_accordion_item title=”keep empty” open=”on” open_toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” body_text_color=”#FFFFFF” body_line_height=”1.5em” background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” background_enable_color=”on” text_orientation=”center” custom_css_main_element=”display: none !important” border_color_all=”#FFFFFF” border_style_all=”dotted” global_colors_info=”{}” toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” toggle_level=”h3″ toggle_text_align=”right” toggle_font_size=”16px” toggle_line_height=”1.4em”]

keep empty

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”2022 Q3 2nd Demo Release + Founder Series Angel Core NFT Sales + Initialization of the Council of the Angels (DAO)” open_toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” body_text_color=”#FFFFFF” body_line_height=”1.5em” background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” background_enable_color=”on” text_orientation=”center” border_color_all=”#FFFFFF” border_style_all=”dotted” global_colors_info=”{}” toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” toggle_level=”h3″ toggle_text_align=”left” toggle_font_size=”16px” toggle_line_height=”1.4em” open=”off”]

The Council of Angels (DAO) kickstarts. More NFT series follow.

Since we will be “collaboratively crafting” the game with you, we will keep releasing vertical slices so you can see progress. The development process will be transparent, and we will develop the game according to your feedback.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][/et_pb_accordion][et_pb_image src=”https://angelicthegame.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/arrow-down.png” title_text=”arrow-down” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” module_alignment=”center” max_height=”100px” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_5″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_divider color=”#FFFFFF” divider_style=”dotted” divider_position=”center” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”10%||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_5″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_accordion _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″][et_pb_accordion_item title=”keep empty” open=”on” open_toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” body_text_color=”#FFFFFF” body_line_height=”1.5em” background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” background_enable_color=”on” text_orientation=”center” custom_css_main_element=”display: none !important” border_color_all=”#FFFFFF” border_style_all=”dotted” global_colors_info=”{}” toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” toggle_level=”h3″ toggle_text_align=”right” toggle_font_size=”16px” toggle_line_height=”1.4em”]

keep empty

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=” 2022 Q2 Public Round, TGE Founder Series NFTs + Airdrops + Releasing Playable Demo #1″ open_toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” body_text_color=”#FFFFFF” body_line_height=”1.5em” background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” background_enable_color=”on” text_orientation=”center” hover_enabled=”0″ border_color_all=”#FFFFFF” border_style_all=”dotted” global_colors_info=”{}” toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” toggle_level=”h3″ toggle_text_align=”left” toggle_font_size=”16px” toggle_line_height=”1.4em” open=”off” sticky_enabled=”0″]

TGE happens. Listing will happen in Q1 or Q2 depending on market sentiment.

We release the first special NFT series, quite a special one, for supporters and fans.

These NFTs will provide unique utilities in the game, and holders of the NFTs will get access to the stage demo early.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][/et_pb_accordion][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_5″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_divider color=”#FFFFFF” divider_style=”dotted” divider_position=”center” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”10%||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_5″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_accordion _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″][et_pb_accordion_item title=”keep empty” open=”on” open_toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” body_text_color=”#FFFFFF” body_line_height=”1.5em” background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” background_enable_color=”on” text_orientation=”center” custom_css_main_element=”display: none !important” border_color_all=”#FFFFFF” border_style_all=”dotted” global_colors_info=”{}” toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” toggle_level=”h3″ toggle_text_align=”right” toggle_font_size=”16px” toggle_line_height=”1.4em”]

keep empty

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”2022 Q1 Closing Rounds and Expanding the Team” open_toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” body_text_color=”#FFFFFF” body_line_height=”1.5em” background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” background_enable_color=”on” text_orientation=”center” hover_enabled=”0″ border_color_all=”#FFFFFF” border_style_all=”dotted” global_colors_info=”{}” toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” toggle_level=”h3″ toggle_text_align=”left” toggle_font_size=”16px” toggle_line_height=”1.4em” open=”off” sticky_enabled=”0″]

All the rounds will be wrapped up. Community events and marketing begins.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][/et_pb_accordion][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_5,1_5,1_5,1_5,1_5″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” transform_scale_tablet=”” transform_scale_phone=”” transform_scale_last_edited=”on|tablet” transform_translate_tablet=”0px|0px” transform_translate_phone=”0px|0px” transform_translate_last_edited=”on|tablet” transform_translate_linked=”off” transform_rotate_tablet=”” transform_rotate_phone=”” transform_rotate_last_edited=”on|tablet” transform_skew_tablet=”” transform_skew_phone=”” transform_skew_last_edited=”on|tablet” transform_origin_tablet=”” transform_origin_phone=”” transform_origin_last_edited=”on|tablet” transform_styles_last_edited=”on|tablet” custom_padding=”0px|||4px||” transform_styles_tablet=”” transform_styles_phone=”” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_5″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_accordion _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_accordion_item title=”keep empty” open=”on” open_toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” body_text_color=”#FFFFFF” body_line_height=”1.5em” background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” background_enable_color=”on” text_orientation=”center” custom_css_main_element=”display: none !important” border_color_all=”#FFFFFF” border_style_all=”dotted” global_colors_info=”{}” toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” toggle_level=”h3″ toggle_text_align=”right” toggle_font_size=”16px” toggle_line_height=”1.4em”]

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”2022 Q4 3rd Demo Release ” open_toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” body_text_color=”#FFFFFF” body_line_height=”1.5em” background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” background_enable_color=”on” text_orientation=”center” border_color_all=”#FFFFFF” border_style_all=”dotted” global_colors_info=”{}” toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” toggle_level=”h3″ toggle_text_align=”left” toggle_font_size=”16px” toggle_line_height=”1.4em” open=”off”]

The team continues to release more content,  and a public live-build will be available. We will continue to expand it, adding more features and content to both singleplayer and multiplayer aspects of the game. 

[/et_pb_accordion_item][/et_pb_accordion][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_5″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_divider color=”#FFFFFF” divider_style=”dotted” divider_position=”center” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”10%||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_5″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_accordion _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_accordion_item title=”keep empty” open=”on” open_toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” body_text_color=”#FFFFFF” body_line_height=”1.5em” background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” background_enable_color=”on” text_orientation=”center” custom_css_main_element=”display: none !important” border_color_all=”#FFFFFF” border_style_all=”dotted” global_colors_info=”{}” toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” toggle_level=”h3″ toggle_text_align=”right” toggle_font_size=”16px” toggle_line_height=”1.4em”]

keep empty

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”2023 Q1 4th Demo Release ” open_toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” body_text_color=”#FFFFFF” body_line_height=”1.5em” background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” background_enable_color=”on” text_orientation=”center” border_color_all=”#FFFFFF” border_style_all=”dotted” global_colors_info=”{}” toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” toggle_level=”h3″ toggle_text_align=”left” toggle_font_size=”16px” toggle_line_height=”1.4em” open=”off”]

Most features will have been implemented. However, Angelic is a living universe, and we will continue to expand it with you, for you!

We release the first special NFT series, quite a special one, for supporters and fans.

These NFTs will provide unique utilities in the game, and holders of the NFTs will get access to the stage demo early.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][/et_pb_accordion][et_pb_image src=”https://angelicthegame.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/arrow-down.png” title_text=”arrow-down” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” module_alignment=”center” max_height=”100px” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_accordion _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_accordion_item title=”keep empty” open=”on” open_toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” body_text_color=”#FFFFFF” body_line_height=”1.5em” background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” background_enable_color=”on” text_orientation=”center” custom_css_main_element=”display: none !important” border_color_all=”#FFFFFF” border_style_all=”dotted” global_colors_info=”{}” toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” toggle_level=”h3″ toggle_text_align=”right” toggle_font_size=”16px” toggle_line_height=”1.4em”]

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”2022 Q3 2nd Demo Release + Founder Series Angel Core NFT Sales + Initialization of the Council of the Angels (DAO)” open_toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” body_text_color=”#FFFFFF” body_line_height=”1.5em” background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” background_enable_color=”on” text_orientation=”center” border_color_all=”#FFFFFF” border_style_all=”dotted” global_colors_info=”{}” toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” toggle_level=”h3″ toggle_text_align=”center” toggle_font_size=”16px” toggle_line_height=”1.4em” open=”off”]

The Council of Angels (DAO) kickstarts. More NFT series follow.

Since we will be “collaboratively crafting” the game with you, we will keep releasing vertical slices so you can see progress. The development process will be transparent, and we will develop the game according to your feedback.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][/et_pb_accordion][et_pb_image src=”https://angelicthegame.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/arrow-down.png” title_text=”arrow-down” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” module_alignment=”center” max_height=”100px” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” transform_scale_tablet=”” transform_scale_phone=”” transform_scale_last_edited=”on|tablet” transform_translate_tablet=”0px|0px” transform_translate_phone=”0px|0px” transform_translate_last_edited=”on|tablet” transform_translate_linked=”off” transform_rotate_tablet=”” transform_rotate_phone=”” transform_rotate_last_edited=”on|tablet” transform_skew_tablet=”” transform_skew_phone=”” transform_skew_last_edited=”on|tablet” transform_origin_tablet=”” transform_origin_phone=”” transform_origin_last_edited=”on|tablet” transform_styles_last_edited=”on|tablet” custom_padding=”0px|||0px|false|false” transform_styles_tablet=”” transform_styles_phone=”” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_accordion _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_accordion_item title=”keep empty” open=”on” open_toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” body_text_color=”#FFFFFF” body_line_height=”1.5em” background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” background_enable_color=”on” text_orientation=”center” custom_css_main_element=”display: none !important” border_color_all=”#FFFFFF” border_style_all=”dotted” global_colors_info=”{}” toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” toggle_level=”h3″ toggle_text_align=”right” toggle_font_size=”16px” toggle_line_height=”1.4em”]

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”2022 Q4 3rd Demo Release ” open_toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” body_text_color=”#FFFFFF” body_line_height=”1.5em” background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” background_enable_color=”on” text_orientation=”center” border_color_all=”#FFFFFF” border_style_all=”dotted” global_colors_info=”{}” toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” toggle_level=”h3″ toggle_text_align=”center” toggle_font_size=”16px” toggle_line_height=”1.4em” open=”off”]

The team continues to release more content,  and a public live-build will be available. We will continue to expand it, adding more features and content to both singleplayer and multiplayer aspects of the game.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][/et_pb_accordion][et_pb_image src=”https://angelicthegame.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/arrow-down.png” title_text=”arrow-down” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” module_alignment=”center” max_height=”100px” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_accordion _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” toggle_text_align=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_accordion_item title=”keep empty” open=”on” open_toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” body_text_color=”#FFFFFF” body_line_height=”1.5em” background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” background_enable_color=”on” text_orientation=”center” custom_css_main_element=”display: none !important” border_color_all=”#FFFFFF” border_style_all=”dotted” global_colors_info=”{}” toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” toggle_level=”h3″ toggle_text_align=”right” toggle_font_size=”16px” toggle_line_height=”1.4em”]

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”2023 Q1 4th Demo Release ” open_toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” body_text_color=”#FFFFFF” body_line_height=”1.5em” background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” background_enable_color=”on” text_orientation=”center” border_color_all=”#FFFFFF” border_style_all=”dotted” global_colors_info=”{}” toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” toggle_level=”h3″ toggle_text_align=”center” toggle_font_size=”16px” toggle_line_height=”1.4em” open=”off”]

Most features will have been implemented. However, Angelic is a living universe, and we will continue to expand it with you, for you!

[/et_pb_accordion_item][/et_pb_accordion][et_pb_image src=”https://angelicthegame.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/arrow-down.png” title_text=”arrow-down” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” module_alignment=”center” max_height=”100px” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_accordion _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” toggle_text_align=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_accordion_item title=”keep empty” open=”on” open_toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” body_text_color=”#FFFFFF” body_line_height=”1.5em” background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” background_enable_color=”on” text_orientation=”center” custom_css_main_element=”display: none !important” border_color_all=”#FFFFFF” border_style_all=”dotted” global_colors_info=”{}” toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” toggle_level=”h3″ toggle_text_align=”right” toggle_font_size=”16px” toggle_line_height=”1.4em”]

keep empty

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”2023 Q2-Q3 Preparations for the Global Full Version Launch and Post-Launch Updates” open_toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” body_text_color=”#FFFFFF” body_line_height=”1.5em” background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” background_enable_color=”on” text_orientation=”center” border_color_all=”#FFFFFF” border_style_all=”dotted” global_colors_info=”{}” toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” toggle_level=”h3″ toggle_text_align=”center” toggle_font_size=”16px” toggle_line_height=”1.4em” open=”off”]

We keep adding more content for the single-player and multiplayer versions
Together with our community, we will decide about the final release date of the game. Even after the full launch, the development will continue of course!
Note: Full release date for each platform may differ.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][/et_pb_accordion][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

excerpt.rendered: ROADMAP2020 September First Gameplay Footage & Narrative Videokeep emptyAfter the coup, the team had to scatter. Erkan (CEO) dived into cryptocurrencies, learned technical analysis and trading, made some money, and used it to restart the company in 2020. Dozens of talented artists and developers joined him in the creation of Angelic’s first vertical slice. The […]
